column2: "There's been little to do since VOID was shut down."
"Well, I can't say it's been boring with all of my idol performances..."
"Hey, maybe I should give the rest up and be a full-time idol? Just kidding..."
"Geh... what do YOU want, four eyes?"
"I'm only here for a quick word, and that's the greeting I get? Well, I suppose I'm used to it..."
"As Quna so eloquently stated, with the suspension of the research facilities, we're no longer needed."
"Besides, you aren't exactly combat material. Why continue to overexert yourself?"
"..I can't argue with that ...but, coming from you, that just pisses me off."
"<%me>, what do you think I should do?"
"2. You should do what you enjoy."
"I'm not pushing myself to do this. Is that what it looks like to you?"
"I thought I was... does it look like I'm trying too hard?"
"Sigh... I don't know what to do. I don't want to quit ARKS, either..."
"Now, now... you're free. Why rush to a decision so soon? Take all the time you need."
"I never imagined the day would come that I'd be able to plan my own future."
